title: The Rust-Glow Leak
description: A thick, phosphorescent sludge is backing up in the lower-district plumbing system. The smell is of wet copper and ancient earth.

turns.narrative: The maintenance tunnels are slick with a viscous, orange film that hums with a faint, low-frequency vibration. Your lantern light reflects off the sludge in greasy rainbows.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You isolate a rare trace of 'Living Iron'. (+1 Lore)
turns.choice_b: Probe the leak with a tool (Dex DC 11)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You find the sludge is moving against the gravity of the pipes. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The sludge begins to pool around your boots, thickening with every second.

turns.narrative: The orange glow intensifies. Above, a main conduit is weeping large, heavy droplets that sizzle when they hit your cloak.
turns.consequence_a: Success: The pressure stabilizes momentarily. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You force the sludge into a secondary containment unit. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: A rhythmic thumping starts from deeper within the pipe—something is pulsing inside.

turns.narrative: The 'thumping' is heavy, like a heartbeat. The pipe walls are swelling and contracting as if they were made of muscle, not brass.
turns.consequence_a: Success: The biological growth slows down. (+100 XP)
turns.choice_b: Cut into the swelling (Atk Roll DC 13)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You drain a pocket of mana-rich ichor. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The sludge forms a semi-solid pseudopod and lashes out toward your face.

turns.narrative: The pseudopod smells of ozone. It's trying to 'sense' your heat, its surface shimmering with a collective, alien intelligence.
turns.choice_a: Blind it with your lantern (Dex DC 12)
turns.consequence_a: Success: The mass recoils into the shadows. (+100 XP)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You solidify the immediate threat. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The main block is up ahead—a massive iron valve completely encased in orange bio-crystal.

turns.narrative: The crystal is translucent. Inside, you can see the valve stem being slowly dissolved by a swarm of microscopic 'Rust-Spiders'.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You clear the mechanism. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The crystal dissolves harmlessly. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: The valve is free, but the pressure in the system is reaching a critical 'Red-Line'.

turns.narrative: Steam whistles through the cracks in the pipes. The orange sludge is boiling now, releasing a gas that makes your eyes water.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You breathe through the toxins. (+100 XP)
turns.choice_b: Vent the gas into the sump
turns.consequence_b: Success: The air clears, revealing the source of the pressure. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: A 'Rust-Mother'—a basketball-sized sphere of teeth and copper wire—is blocking the main drain.

turns.narrative: The Rust-Mother hums at a pitch that threatens to shatter your lantern glass. It begins to pull metal from your own gear.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You resist the magnetic pull. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: The sphere shatters into harmless scraps. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The pressure drops instantly. The orange glow fades to a dim, dying ember.

turns.narrative: The drain opens with a mournful groan. The sludge is sucked away, leaving the pipes stained but silent.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You prevent a secondary outbreak. (+1 Morale)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You find a cluster of 'Rust-Pearls'. (+1 Loot)
turns.convergence: The system is quiet. The low-district will have water tonight.

turns.narrative: You pack your tools, your boots caked in the orange residue. The Steward’s voice crackles over the local intercom, asking for a status report.
turns.consequence_a: Success: Your reliability with Maintenance increases. (+1 Rep)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You hide the samples for your own study. (+1 Secret)
turns.convergence: You climb the ladder back to the surface level.

turns.narrative: The cold night air of the Ridge is a relief after the humid, ozone-heavy tunnels. The water begins to flow through the pumps behind you.
turns.consequence_a: Success: The relief in the Lower Ward is palpable. (+5 Morale)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You recover your strength. (+1 Luck)

conclusion: The Rust-Glow Leak was more than just plumbing issues; it was a localized birth of Living Iron. The plumbing is restored, for now.

risk_matrix.penalty: Leads to a 'Rust-Bloom' outbreak. -2 Settlement Health and water rationing.
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

unlock_conditions.trigger: Maintenance crew reports glowing sludge in Lower Ward pipes

permanent_effects.settlement: Plumbing restored; Living Iron sample archived
